edition: Hymni Homerici, creator; Hesiod, creator; Homer, creator; Evelyn-White, Hugh G. (Hugh Gerard), d. 1924, translator

text.0:
I sing of golden-throned Hera whom Rhea bare. Queen of the immortals is she,
 surpassing all in beauty: she is the sister and the wife of loud-thundering Zeus, —the
 glorious one whom all the blessed throughout high Olympus
text.1: reverence and honor even as Zeus who delights in thunder.

author: homeric hymns
